summaries.subject: [GitHub Education] 😢 @Gokul712003
summaries.summary: GitHub Education emailed Gokul712003 to inform them that their academic affiliation verification failed due to inconsistencies with the information submitted on Feb 7, 2025.  The email details three issues:  mismatched school information, incomplete GitHub billing information, and a lack of device camera verification for academic documents.  Gokul712003 is advised to revisit the application and correct these issues, using the provided links for support.

summaries.subject: [GitHub] An email address was added to your account.
summaries.summary: This email from GitHub notifies you that a new email address (gokulaprasath.s2024@vitstudent.ac.in) has been added to your account.  It provides a link to review your currently associated email addresses.  The email also encourages you to check your security settings and contact support if you didn't authorize this change.

summaries.subject: "student" job: Student Web Intern at MURVEN Design Solutions  opportunity
summaries.summary: This LinkedIn email contains job alerts for "student" roles.  It highlights a Student Web Intern position at MURVEN Design Solutions, providing a link to view the job details.  The email also includes links to search for similar jobs and manage job alert preferences.

summaries.subject: All career queries. One answer 😎
summaries.summary: The email from Naukri Campus had the subject line "All career queries. One answer 😎" but contained no actual content.  It's likely a flawed or empty email sent in error.  The sender's address suggests it was intended for career-related inquiries.

summaries.subject: The fastest-growing jobs in Chennai
summaries.summary: This LinkedIn email announces the fastest-growing jobs in Chennai.  It includes links to view the full report on the LinkedIn website.  The email also provides options to unsubscribe from similar emails.

summaries.subject: naukri campus : Last few days to enroll for Coding Contest
summaries.summary: The email is from Naukri Alerts, regarding their campus coding contest.  The subject line indicates the enrollment deadline is approaching.  The email body is empty.  There is no further information provided within the email itself.  It essentially serves as a reminder about the contest's impending deadline.

summaries.subject: "Help!!!"
summaries.summary: This email from Reddit is a help request regarding the finding of  "HOD of physicks". The sender tried to contact "Dr. Balakrishnan Subramanian" for three days but couldn't find him.  They mention asking someone who said they knew the person's HOD of every department. The email's content is primarily HTML code for a webpage, likely part of the communication attempt.  The HTML includes links to various Reddit pages and images.

summaries.subject: Here’s the latest post from SRM IST Chennai
summaries.summary: This LinkedIn email announces several new posts from SRM IST Chennai.  The posts cover topics such as medical college events, managing anxiety during virtual interviews, and tips for younger engineers.  Each post includes a link to view it on LinkedIn.  The email also contains options to manage email settings and unsubscribe.  The email footer includes standard LinkedIn copyright and contact information.

summaries.subject: Are Blender Bros "con men"?
summaries.summary: Blender Bros received an email questioning their legitimacy and accusing them of being con men.  The email references a Reddit article and a significant number of mini-courses sold.  Blender Bros claim they've sold over 1000 hours of content with affiliate partners and are currently limited by time.  They acknowledge customer concerns about high prices but defend their value, citing successful student outcomes and a money-back guarantee.  The company intends to address the accusations and provide transparency to improve customer trust.

summaries.subject: "student" job: Student Web Intern at MURVEN Design Solutions  opportunity
summaries.summary: This LinkedIn email advertises several student internship opportunities.  It highlights a Student Web Intern position at MURVEN Design Solutions.  The email provides links to view each job description.  Additional student/intern opportunities in different fields are also listed.  Users can manage their job alerts through provided links.
